1.text: The name alligator means the lizard in spanish

2.text: The oldest alligator is more than eighty years old

3.text: Young alligators like to eat snails

4.text: Alligators can be as long as a man is tall

5.text: Alligators can make a bellowing sound

6.text: Aliigators can smell and hear very well

7.text: The alligator tail is flat and full of muscles

8.text: Alligators have more than 80 teeth in their mouth

9.text: Alligators have very good night vision

10.text: Some alligators are as white as snow
